name: Gretel Hagbane

skills.name: Unknown Skill
skills.description: Evil UndoneAttacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. If Hansel Witchhunter is on the same team, attacks all enemies instead. Has a 25% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Also places an extra hit against enemies under any buffs.Level 2: Damage +10%Level 3: Damage +10%Level 4: Buff/Debuff chance +10%Level 5: Buff/Debuff chance +15%Damage Multiplier: 3.8 ATK (Single Target), 2.4 ATK (AoE)

skills.description: 4 turns)Attacks 1 enemy 4 times. The first hit will ignore 10% of the target’s DEF, the second hit will ignore 15% DEF, the third hit will ignore 20% DEF, and the fourth hit will ignore 25% DEF. If this attack kills an enemy, resets the cooldown of this skill and fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 50%.Level 2: Damage +10%Level 3: Damage +10%Level 4: Cooldown -1Damage Multiplier: 1.4 ATK

skills.name: Unknown Skill
skills.description:
4 turns)Attacks all enemies. Decreases the Turn Meters of all enemies by 25%. If Hansel Witchhunter is on the same team, decreased the Turn Meter of all enemies by 50% instead. This effect cannot be resisted. Then fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 20% for each enemy alive after the attack.Level 2: Damage +10%Level 3: Damage +10%Level 4: Cooldown -1Damage Multiplier: 4.1 ATK
Sisterly Bond (Passive, Cooldown: 3 turns)[Passive Effect] Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 50% whenever an enemy is granted an Extra Turn. If Hansel Witchhunter is on the same team, also fills their Turn Meter by 50% whenever an enemy is granted an Extra Turn.[Active Effect] If Hansel Witchhunter is on the same team and is killed by the enemy, instantly activates [Sacred Ritual] skill.
AuraIncreases Ally ATK in all battles by 30%
